p.k: Tatarstan National Symphony Orchestra: Glinka, Tchaikovsky and Moussorgsky (2016).
p.d:
Tatarstan National Symphony Orchestra, Alexander Sladkovsky (Conductor) Denis Matsuev (piano)
Mikhail Glinka Ouverture to Ruslan and Lyudmila
Piotr Tchaikovsky Piano Concerto no. 2 in G major op. 44
Modest Mussorgsky (orch. Maurice Ravel) Pictures at an exhibition
Recorded on December 6, 2016 at the Musikverein, Vienna
